amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the possession of any cigarette or other tobacco product by individuals under the age of 18 in the District of Columbia.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 106-790 to prohibit possession of tobacco products by any individual under age 18 in the District of Columbia unless the individual is making a delivery of cigarettes or tobacco as part of his or her employment or is participating in a supervised law enforcement operation. The amendment also provides optional sentencing recommendations for violations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bilbray amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 265 - 155 (Roll no. 472).
